Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the labeling of medication abortion prescription drugs
Summary: Permits prescription labels for mifepristone, misoprostol, and their generic alternatives to include the name of the prescribing health care practice instead of the name of the prescriber at the prescriber's request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the labeling of mifepristone, misoprostol, and their generic alternatives
